subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Most amazing session

full_text:
--0-1026170447-1208046206=:26719
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1

Rees, Stefan is a 100% right, it should pop up to restore.  I use Audition for all of my editing!  Good Luck!

Juli

Stefan Bion <yahoogroups@...> wrote:                             Hi Rees,
 
 Audition does do this automatically: If you restart Audition after a
 crash, it will show the window (see attachment). If you click "Continue
 now", your session will be restored.
 
 Stefan
 
 -- 
 
 > tell me how to recover 
 
 > Stefan Bion <yahoogroups@...> wrote:          Hi Rees,
 
 > Audition can recover an unsaved session in case the program (or
 > computer) should crash.
 
 > But perhaps it was intention that the session was not saved - who
 > knows... paranormal phenomena are often elusive by their nature.
 
 > Stefan
